# googleforms_sheets_developer_metadata (Resource)

Manages Google Sheets developer metadata via spreadsheets.batchUpdate.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `metadata_key` (String) Developer metadata key.
- `spreadsheet_id` (String) Target spreadsheet ID.

### Optional

- `location` (Attributes) Optional sheet-scoped location. If omitted, metadata is spreadsheet-scoped. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--location))
- `metadata_value` (String) Developer metadata value.
- `visibility` (String) Visibility: DOCUMENT (default) or PROJECT.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Composite ID in the format spreadsheetID#metadataId.
- `metadata_id` (Number) Developer metadata ID assigned by the API.

<a id="nestedatt--location"></a>
### Nested Schema for `location`

Optional:

- `sheet_id` (Number) Sheet/tab ID (sheetId) to scope the metadata to the sheet.
